laboratory_examinations.findings: Hemoglobin level was 13.6 mg/dL (reference range, 14.0 to 18.0) - outside normal range.

FEV1 of 2.50 liters (82% of predicted value), FVC of 2.90 liters (73% of predicted value), FEV1/FVC ratio of 0.86, total lung capacity of 3.92 liters (61% of predicted value), carbon monoxide diffusion capacity of 45% of predicted value - indicative of a restrictive ventilatory deficit with diffusion impairment.
127 U/L (reference range, 60 to 400) - within normal range.
22 mm/hour (reference range, 0 to 13) - outside normal range.
Progression of bilateral subpleural reticular opacities and bilateral traction bronchiectasis, without mature honeycombing.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Evidence of air trapping was less extensive than it had been on pulmonary CT angiography.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Evidence of new right ventricular dilatation and hypokinesis, with a right ventricular systolic pressure of 71 mm Hg.
